original_text: And it came to pass, as they fled from before Israel, and were in the going down to Bethhoron, that the Lord cast down great stones from heaven upon them unto Azekah, and they died: they were more which died with hailstones than they whom the children of Israel slew with the sword.
korean_text: 그들이 이스라엘 앞에서 도망하여 벧 호론의 비탈에서 내려갈 때에 여호와께서 하늘에서 큰 우박 덩이를 아세가에 이르기까지 내리시매 그들이 죽었으니 이스라엘 자손의 칼에 죽은 자보다 우박에 죽은 자가 더 많았더라

sentences.original_text: as they fled from before Israel
and were in the going down to Bethhoron
that the Lord cast down great stones from heaven upon them
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 하늘에서 큰 돌들을 그들에게 내리셨으니

sentences.original_text: they were more which died with hailstones
than they whom the children of Israel slew with the sword
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 자손이 칼로 죽인 자보다 더 많았더라
